name: a3198a77-27d7-59a3-9039-96e21780a955
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at K-puszta, Hungary (20120101 - 20130101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at K-puszta, Hungary (20120101 - 20130101)
